alert.note: Alert for Allegany (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:10PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Allegany County through 1045 PM EDT... At 1009 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Alfred to near Genesee. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Wellsville, Alfred, Whitesville, Andover, Almond, West Almond, Stannards and Paynesville. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 32 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
